avalancheActivity.highlights: Near-surface snow thoroughly wet in the sunshine
avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanche danger is low. In isolated cases, new snow can be a problem. Small loose-snow slides can trigger naturally in extremely steep terrain wherever sufficient snow has fallen due to solar radiation.

snowpackStructure.comment: Snowpack melt-freeze encrusted in early morning,softening quickly in the sunshine, the snowpack moistening thoroughly in places as temperatures rise and firmness is forfeited. There there was snow on the ground it is now wet, esp on south-facing slopes the ground is bare up to the timberline. At high altitudes the surface on shady slopes is still loose and dry.

tendency.highlights: Transition to springtime conditions, including daytime rise in avalanche danger

customData.generalHeadline: Small loose-snow avalanches possible in the sunshine
